p: Key informants also flagged the importance of prioritising sustainability activities to those that will be most impactful. Sustainability is a broad agenda, and different stakeholders have different concerns. Informants spoke to the importance of prioritising resources and action where the greatest carbon savings could be made. In one example, carbon footprint analysis showed that the greatest sources of emissions were from air travel. This is unsurprising given the global nature of global health. One key informant suggested that the number of in‐person meetings of the Trop Ed network itself should be reduced and locations chosen based on accessibility by train.
